code_snippet: usage: nvram [get name] [set name=value] [getflag flagname bit][setflag flagname bit=value] [unset name] [show] [commit] ...

description: General vulnerability was found in the libnvram.so library, which contains NVRAM operation functions that may be called by other programs. Further analysis is required to determine which programs link to this library and how these functions are utilized.
